title: vue+ts案例
content:
main.ts

import { createApp } from "vue";
import App from "./App.vue";
import router from "./router";
import store from "./store";
import Vant from "vant";

import "vant/lib/index.css";
createApp(App)
  .use(Vant)
  .use(store)
  .use(router)
  .mount("#app");

App.vue

<template>
  <div class="nav">
    <router-view v-slot="{ Com }">
      <keep-alive>
        <component :is="Com"></component>
      </keep-alive>
    </router-view>
    <van-tabbar route>
      <van-tabbar-item replace to="/" icon="home-o">home</van-tabbar-item>
      <van-tabbar-item replace to="/mime" icon="orders-o">mime</van-tabbar-item>
      <van-tabbar-item replace to="/profile" icon="manager-o"
        >profile</van-tabbar-item
      >
    </van-tabbar>
  </div>
</template>

Router

import { createRouter, createWebHistory, RouteRecordRaw } from "vue-router";
import Home from "../views/Home/index.vue";

const routes: Array<RouteRecordRaw> = [
  {
    path: "/",
    name: "Home",
    component: Home,
  },
  {
    path: "/mime",
    name: "Mime",
    // route level code-splitting
    // this generates a separate chunk (about.[hash].js) for this route
    // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
    component: () =>
      import(/* webpackChunkName: "about" */ "../views/Mime/index.vue"),
  },
  {
    path: "/profile",
    name: "Profile",
    // route level code-splitting
    // this generates a separate chunk (about.[hash].js) for this route
    // which is lazy-loaded when the route is visited.
    component: () =>
      import(/* webpackChunkName: "about" */ "../views/Profile/index.vue"),
  },
];

const router = createRouter({
  history: createWebHistory(process.env.BASE_URL),
  routes,
});

export default router;

view

home

// index.vue

<template>
  <div class="home">
    {{ category }}
    <!-- 首页头部 -->
    <HomeHeader
      :category="category"
      @setCurrentCategory="setCurrentCategory"
    ></HomeHeader>
    <div class="home-container" ref="refreshElm">
      <!-- 轮播图 -->
      <Suspense>
        <template #default>
          <HomeSwiper></HomeSwiper>
        </template>
        <template #fallback>
          <div>loading.....</div>
        </template>
      </Suspense>
      <!-- 课程列表 -->
      <HomeList :lessonList="lessonList"></HomeList>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { useLoadMore } from "@/hooks";
import { GlobalState } from "@/store";
import { Store, useStore } from "vuex";
import { computed, defineComponent, onMounted, ref } from "vue";
import HomeHeader from "./HomeHeader.vue";
import HomeList from "./HomeList.vue";
import HomeSwiper from "./HomeSwiper.vue";
import { CATEGORY_TYPES } from "@/typings/home";
import * as Types from "../../store/actionType";

function useCategory(store: Store<GlobalState>) {
  let category = computed(() => store.state.home.currentCategory);
  function setCurrentCategory(category: CATEGORY_TYPES) {
    store.commit(`home/${Types.SET_CATEGORY}`, category);
  }
  return {
    category,
    setCurrentCategory,
  };
}

function useLessonList(store: Store<GlobalState>) {
  const lessonList = computed(() => store.state.home.lessons.list);
  onMounted(() => {
    if (lessonList.value.length == 0) {
      store.dispatch(`home/${Types.SET_LESSON_LIST}`);
    }
  });

  return {
    lessonList,
  };
}

export default defineComponent({
  name: "Home",
  components: {
    HomeHeader,
    HomeList,
    HomeSwiper,
  },
  setup() {
    const store = useStore<GlobalState>();
    // 真实的DOM
    const refreshElm = ref<null | HTMLElement>(null);
    const { isLoading, hasMore } = useLoadMore(
      refreshElm,
      store,
      `home/${Types.SET_LESSON_LIST}`
    );
    const { category, setCurrentCategory } = useCategory(store);
    const { lessonList } = useLessonList(store);
    return {
      category,
      setCurrentCategory,
      lessonList,
      refreshElm,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.home-container {
  position: absolute;
  top: 65px;
  bottom: 50px;
  width: 100%;
  overflow-y: scroll;
}
</style>


// HomeHeader.vue
<template>
  <div class="home-header">
    <img src="@/assets/logo.png" alt="logo" />
    <van-dropdown-menu>
      <van-dropdown-item
        :modelValue="category"
        :options="options"
        @change="change"
      />
    </van-dropdown-menu>
  </div>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { CATEGORY_TYPES } from "@/typings/home";
import { defineComponent, PropType, reactive, toRefs } from "vue";
export default defineComponent({
  name: "HomeHeader",
  props: {
    category: {
      type: Number as PropType<CATEGORY_TYPES>,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  emits: ["setCurrentCategory"],
  setup(props, context) {
    function change(value: CATEGORY_TYPES) {
      context.emit("setCurrentCategory", value);
    }
    const state = reactive({
      options: [
        { text: "全部课程", value: CATEGORY_TYPES.ALL },
        { text: "REACT", value: CATEGORY_TYPES.REACT },
        { text: "VUE", value: CATEGORY_TYPES.VUE },
        { text: "NODE", value: CATEGORY_TYPES.NODE },
      ],
    });

    return { ...toRefs(state), change };
  },
});
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.home-header {
  height: 65px;
  background: #2a2a2a;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 0 2.5%;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 95%;
  img {
    height: 50px;
  }
  .van-dropdown-menu__title {
    color: #fff;
  }
  .van-dropdown-menu__bar {
    background: #2a2a2a;
  }
}
</style>

// HomeList.vue
<template>
  <div>
    <van-card
      v-for="l in lessonList"
      :key="l.id"
      :price="l.price"
      :title="l.title"
      :thumb="l.poster"
    >
      <template #tags>
        <van-tag plain>
          {{ formatCategory(l.category) }}
        </van-tag>
      </template>
    </van-card>
  </div>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent, PropType } from "vue";
import { ILesson } from "@/typings/home";
export default defineComponent({
  props: {
    lessonList: {
      type: Array as PropType<ILesson[]>,
    },
  },
  setup() {
    function formatCategory(type: number) {
      switch (type) {
        case 1:
          return "react";
        case 2:
          return "vue";
        case 3:
          return "node";
        default:
          return "all";
      }
    }
    return {
      formatCategory,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style></style>

// HomeSwiper.vue
<template>
  <van-swipe v-if="sliderList.length">
    <van-swipe-item v-for="l in sliderList" :key="l.url">
      <img :src="l.url" alt="" style="max-width: 100%" />
    </van-swipe-item>
  </van-swipe>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { computed, defineComponent } from "vue";
import { GlobalState } from "@/store/index";
import { useStore } from "vuex";
import * as Types from "@/store/actionType";
export default defineComponent({
  async setup() {
    const store = useStore<GlobalState>();
    let sliderList = computed(() => store.state.home.sliders);
    if (sliderList.value.length === 0) {
      await store.dispatch(`home/${Types.SET_SLIDER_LIST}`);
    }
    return {
      sliderList,
    };
  },
});
</script>

store

actionType

// 分类信息
export const SET_CATEGORY = "SET_CATEGORY";
// 轮播图信息
export const SET_SLIDER_LIST = "SET_SLIDER_LIST";

// 设置课程列表
export const SET_LESSON_LIST = "SET_LESSON_LIST";
// 加载状态
export const SET_LOADING = "SET_LOADING";

index

import { IHomeState } from "@/typings/home";
import { createStore } from "vuex";
import home from "./modules/home";

export interface GlobalState {
  home: IHomeState;
}

const store = createStore<GlobalState>({
  mutations: {},
  actions: {},
  modules: {
    home,
  },
});

export default store;

modules

// home.ts
import { getLesson, getSlider } from "@/api/home";
import { Module } from "vuex";
import { GlobalState } from "..";
import {
  CATEGORY_TYPES,
  IHomeState,
  ILessons,
  ISlider,
} from "../../typings/home";
import * as Types from "../actionType";

// 首页的数据

const state: IHomeState = {
  currentCategory: CATEGORY_TYPES.ALL,
  sliders: [],
  lessons: {
    hasMore: true,
    loading: false,
    offset: 0,
    limit: 5,
    list: [],
  },
};

const home: Module<IHomeState, GlobalState> = {
  namespaced: true,
  state,
  mutations: {
    [Types.SET_CATEGORY](state, payload: CATEGORY_TYPES) {
      state.currentCategory = payload;
    },
    [Types.SET_SLIDER_LIST](state, payload: ISlider[]) {
      state.sliders = payload;
    },
    [Types.SET_LOADING](state, payload: boolean) {
      state.lessons.loading = payload;
    },
    [Types.SET_LESSON_LIST](state, payload: ILessons) {
      state.lessons.list = [...state.lessons.list, ...payload.list];
      state.lessons.hasMore = payload.hasMore;
      state.lessons.offset = state.lessons.offset + payload.list.length;
    },
  },
  actions: {
    async [Types.SET_SLIDER_LIST]({ commit }) {
      let sliders = await getSlider<ISlider>();
      commit(Types.SET_SLIDER_LIST, sliders);
    },
    async [Types.SET_LESSON_LIST]({ commit }) {
      if (state.lessons.loading) {
        return;
      }
      if (!state.lessons.hasMore) {
        return;
      }
      commit(Types.SET_LOADING, true);
      const lessons = await getLesson<ILessons>(
        state.currentCategory,
        state.lessons.offset,
        state.lessons.limit
      );

      commit(Types.SET_LESSON_LIST, lessons);
      commit(Types.SET_LOADING, false);
    },
  },
};

export default home;




## api

### index.ts

```javascript
import axios, { AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse } from "axios";
axios.defaults.baseURL = "http://www.fullstackjavascript.cn:3000";

axios.interceptors.request.use((config: AxiosRequestConfig) => {
  return config;
});

axios.interceptors.response.use(
  (response: AxiosResponse) => {
    // 出错了
    if (response.data.err == 1) {
      return Promise.reject(response.data.data);
    }
    return response.data;
  },
  (err) => {
    return Promise.reject(err);
  }
);

export default axios;

home.ts

import { CATEGORY_TYPES } from "@/typings/home";
import axios from ".";

export function getSlider<T>() {
  return axios.get<T, T>("/slider/list");
}

export function getLesson<T>(
  category: CATEGORY_TYPES,
  offset: number = 0,
  limit: number = 5
) {
  return axios.get<T, T>(
    `/lesson/list?category=${category}&offset=${offset}&limit=${limit}`
  );
}

hooks

import { GlobalState } from "@/store";
import { Ref } from "@vue/reactivity";
import { Store } from "vuex";
import _ from "lodash";
import { computed, onMounted } from "@vue/runtime-core";

export function useLoadMore(
  refreshElm: Ref<null | HTMLElement>,
  store: Store<GlobalState>,
  type: string
) {
  let element: HTMLElement;
  // 防抖

  function _loadMore() {
    // 可视高度
    let containerHeight = element.clientHeight;
    // 卷曲高度
    let scrollTop = element.scrollTop;

    // 整个高度
    let scrollHeight = element.scrollHeight;

    if (containerHeight + scrollTop + 20 >= scrollHeight) {
      store.dispatch(type);
    }
  }
  onMounted(() => {
    element = refreshElm.value as HTMLElement;
    element.addEventListener("scroll", _.debounce(_loadMore, 200));
  });

  const isLoading = computed(() => store.state.home.lessons.loading);
  const hasMore = computed(() => store.state.home.lessons.hasMore);
  return {
    isLoading,
    hasMore,
  };
}

typings

export enum CATEGORY_TYPES {
  ALL,
  NODE,
  VUE,
  REACT,
}

export interface ILesson {
  title: string;
  video: string;
  poster: string;
  price: number;
  category?: string;
}

export interface ILessons {
  hasMore: boolean;
  loading: boolean;
  offset: number;
  limit: number;
  list: ILesson[];
}

export interface ISlider {
  url: string;
}

export interface IHomeState {
  currentCategory: CATEGORY_TYPES;
  sliders: ISlider[];
  lessons: ILessons;
}
